Windlord::

Windlord smiled and say "Sure, Follow me... Er... Sorry I took a 
flashlightfrom your ship, we will need it. I hope that you don't mind 
it Preplex"

After took a flashlight that he had took, came in inside the ship 
showing his friends the way. Nightlight said the children "come kids, 
we have to come in"
